summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
Review Date: 2014/11/12
Store: RY
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
Review Text: First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
Review Title: So irritating!!!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)
Review Date: 2018/01/22
Store: EBOOT
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '100 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 0.04 x 0.35 inches; 3.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '712971921153'}
Review Text: At first I thought they were amazing but then I realized they kept slipping out of my hair because the second I would put them in my hair they would loose their bend and double the opening. Will be returning!!!
Review Title: Not amazing like I hoped 😔
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: INOAR PROFESSIONAL - Argan Oil - Promotes Hair Control, Prevents and Repairs Split Ends, and Protects Hair From the Effects of Heat Styling Tools (2 Ounces / 60 Milliliters)
Review Date: 2018/09/21
Store: Inoar
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 1.57 x 4.53 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7898581080503', 'Manufacturer': 'Inoar'}
Review Text: OMG! This stuff is AMAZING! The bottle was smaller than I expected but it is VERY thick oil so a little drop goes a very long way and it smells so so good. I put a little in after I straighten my hair so my hair is always moisturized
Review Title: Soooooo worth it!!!!😍😍
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 2019 Hair Feel Finishing Stick, Broken Hair Cream Finishing Sticks Refreshing Not Greasy Small Broken Hair Shaping Gel Sticks Easy To Shape Hairstyle
Review Date: 2019/06/14
Store: AL'lVER
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 1 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
Review Text: The product it’s self sucked. Didn’t hold my hair down for very long but the brush was awesome based on some other brushes
Review Title: Pass!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen
Review Date: 2019/08/11
Store: AIKIMUSE
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Liquid,Pencil,Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 4.25 x 1 inches; 0.18 Ounces', 'UPC': '887349693427'}
Review Text: I thought the color looked good but nothing would come out after the first half of a stroke! Waist of money
Review Title: :(
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [RIRE] Fork Tattoo Eyebrow Lasts up to 8 days! Long Lasting Waterproof Tattoo Eyebrow (02 Dark Brown)
Review Date: 2019/08/11
Store: RiRe
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.42 x 5.59 x 0.71 inches; 0.71 Ounces'}
Review Text: I really wanted to like it cause the ink that comes out is a steady flow and the forks are the perfect size BUT I got DARK BROWN and it left an orange stain on my skin for 2 days, so ridiculous
Review Title: Not true color
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mirenesse Skin Clone Mineral Powder Foundation SPF15, 4-in-1 Flawless Skin Serum High Coverage Matte Finish Hydrating Silky Powder in Compact, Vegan & Toxin Free, 13 Vanilla 0.21oz Mini
Review Date: 2019/10/18
Store: Mirenesse
Average Rating: 3.7

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed strong satisfaction with several items in their purchase history, particularly appreciating the effectiveness and quality of hair care products. A standout experience was with a specific oil, praised for its outstanding results, pleasant scent, and efficiency in moisturizing. This indicates a preference for products that deliver on promises and provide tangible benefits. Another positive interaction was with a hair styling product that, despite its drawbacks, was complemented by an impressive brush, suggesting a willingness to recognize quality when it exists alongside a less favorable product experience.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user encountered significant dissatisfaction with various products, particularly noting issues with product quality and effectiveness. Complaints included defective items, such as a hair pin set that failed to hold hair effectively, and an eyebrow pen that performed poorly after minimal use. Several products led to feelings of frustration due to inaccurate color representation or poor performance, culminating in a series of returns and waste of money. The overall tone of these reviews reflected disappointment and irritation, highlighting a mismatch between expectation and reality across multiple purchases.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experience reveals a mix of emotions, with notable highs and lows. On the positive side, the user found effective hair care solutions that delivered great results and recognized quality in some tools. However, the majority of the interactions leaned towards disappointment, characterized by poor performance, flawed products, and unmet expectations. This suggests a shopper seeking quality but often encountering items that fail to meet their standards, leading to a history of returns and dissatisfaction. The contrasting experiences show the importance of quality assurance in product offerings.

target_interaction.title: Pretty great
target_interaction.text: The pen is so soft and doesn’t hurt when using it and the auburn color is a great light ish brown but the little powder puff isn’t as easy to use. The puff just smashes into your face and doesn’t always put powder down when you need it.
target_interaction.title_meta: MOSTORY 3 in 1 Eyebrow Pencil - Super Model Perfect Brow Stylist Waterproof Brown Eye Brow Makeup Long Lasting Professional Soft Powder Pen Brush (AUBURN)
